column4: hey guys, I compiled a custom iwl4965 module (wifi) but its really unstable, any idea how I could load over the old one that came with the kernel?
well I used compat-wireless to compile it so yes
do you still have the folder with the compat-wireless sources from which u installed?
if u have it just do sudo make uninstall
then my old module will reload itself?
compat-wireless doesnt overwrite native modules it puts them in the update folder, and after you uninstall that folder will be deleted and the kernel will revert back to old modules
you'll have to rmmod and modprobe of course
ah I see, should I rmmod iwl4965 first?
yea rmmod iwl4945 mac80211 cfg80211 led_class in that order
